verbs.description: [ARG0: The White House] [V: said] [ARG1: Trump ’s top economic adviser suffered a “ very mild heart attack , ” and is expected to make a full recovery] .
The White House said [ARG0: Trump ’s top economic adviser] [V: suffered] [ARG1: a “ very mild heart attack] , ” and is expected to make a full recovery .
The White House said Trump ’s top economic adviser suffered a “ very mild heart attack , ” and [V: is] expected to make a full recovery .
The White House said [ARG1: Trump ’s top economic adviser] suffered a “ very mild heart attack , ” and is [V: expected] [C-ARG1: to make a full recovery] .
The White House said [ARG0: Trump ’s top economic adviser] suffered a “ very mild heart attack , ” and is expected to [V: make] [ARG1: a full recovery] .
